title: Cartography Config
description: Defines overrides for color providers and compositors to use with cartography rendering.

override_chart_color_provider.description: Override the chart color provider to use. Value should be a C# type name like 'BundledStripChartColorProvider' or 'JsonChartColorProvider'.

override_active_compositors.description: Provides an ordered list of compositors to apply. The fist elements will be applied on top of lower ones (they are applied in reverse). Values should be a C# type name like 'OverlayCartographyCompositor'.
